title: Chargers-Chiefs, Cowboys-Patriots, and the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Chargers-Chiefs, Cowboys-Patriots, and the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the Chargers-Chiefs game, why it's time to move on from QB Philip Rivers, why he's not worried about the Patriots offense, the upcoming Cowboys-Patriots game, and his new Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Rashad Jennings, Peter King, and Reggie Bush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
